com.soa.policy.config
Interface PolicyManager

public interface PolicyManager

The PolicyManager is an interface for managing policy configuration.

Since:
6.0

Method Summary

Method Detail

updatePolicyConfiguration

void updatePolicyConfiguration(java.lang.String policyKey,
                               javax.xml.transform.Source policyConfiguration)
                               throws GException
Save policy configuration for a policy key. Policy configuration must have a policy element wrapper.

Parameters:
policyKey -
policyConfiguration -
Throws:
GException

getPolicyConfiguration

javax.xml.transform.Source getPolicyConfiguration(java.lang.String policyKey)
                                                  throws GException
Retrieve policy configuration with policy key

Parameters:
policyKey - policy key
Returns:
Source is an XML source containing policy configuration
Throws:
GException

getPolicyKey

java.lang.String getPolicyKey(Policy policy)
                              throws GException
Match existing policy against the Policy model by either policy name or policy id. If policy name is specified, use policy name to match, otherwise, if policy id is specified, use policy id to match. If both policy name and policy id are specified, only policy name is used to match.

Parameters:
policy - model
Returns:
policy key which represents existing policy matched, otherwise return null
Throws:
GException

updateAllowed

boolean updateAllowed(java.lang.String policyKey)
                      throws GException
Checks if current user is allowed to update policy.

Parameters:
policyKey -
Returns:
true if current user allowed to update policy, false otherwise
Throws:
GException
